title: Mike Munger on the Division of Labor
description: Mike Munger of Duke University and EconTalk host Russ Roberts talk about specialization, the role of technology in aiding specialization and how the division of labor creates wealth.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)
content:encoded: Mike Munger of Duke University and EconTalk host Russ Roberts talk about specialization, the role of technology in aiding specialization and how the division of labor creates wealth.
